  • Method Details

    • thereAreAtLeastResourcesWithStatusActive

      @Given("there are at least {int} resources with status {string}") public void thereAreAtLeastResourcesWithStatusActive(int numberOfResources, String state)
      This method creates resources if there are less than the required number of resources
      Parameters:
      numberOfResources - int with the number of resources to create if there are less than the required number of resources
      state - String with the state of the resources to create (active or inactive)

    • iRetrieveAllActiveResources

      @When("I retrieve all active resources") public void iRetrieveAllActiveResources()
      This method retrieves all active resources

    • theListOfActiveResourcesShouldBeRetrievedSuccessfully

      @Then("the list of active resources should be retrieved successfully") public void theListOfActiveResourcesShouldBeRetrievedSuccessfully()
      This method validates that the list of active resources is retrieved successfully

    • iUpdateAllTheseResourcesToInactive

      @And("I update all these resources to inactive") public void iUpdateAllTheseResourcesToInactive()
      This method updates all active resources to inactive

    • theResponseOfPutRequestShouldHaveAStatusCodeOf

      @And("the response of put request should have a status code of {int}") public void theResponseOfPutRequestShouldHaveAStatusCodeOf(int statusCode)
      This method validates the response of the put request

    • deleteAllResourcesRegisteredInThisScenario

      @And("delete all resources registered in this scenario") public void deleteAllResourcesRegisteredInThisScenario()
      This method deletes all resources registered in this scenario

    • thereAreAtLeastResourcesInTheSystem

      @Given("there are at least {int} resources in the system") public void thereAreAtLeastResourcesInTheSystem(int numberOfResources)
      This method creates resources if there are less than the required number of resources
      Parameters:
      numberOfResources - int with the number of resources to create if there are less than the required number of resources

    • iRetrieveTheLatestCreatedResource

      @When("I retrieve the latest created resource") public void iRetrieveTheLatestCreatedResource()

      @Then("the response body data should reflect the updated values") public void theResponseBodyDataShouldReflectTheUpdatedValues()
